message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity. The product we have available is not just any item; it holds immense value and could significantly impact your endeavors. Given its worth to us, we are offering it to you at a special price tailored to reflect its true potential and your appreciation for it. We kindly propose to sell the product to you for $900,000. This offer is exclusive to you and represents a significant saving compared to our standard pricing. We believe this would be a mutually beneficial arrangement, allowing us to recoup a substantial portion of the product's value while enabling you to acquire it at a favorable rate. Please let us know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer.
